alert.note: Alert for Carson; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:03PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Carson and east central Potter Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles south of Fritch, or 15 miles northwest of Panhandle, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pantex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
